system.requirements: Tau Drone Handler Alternative Advance, 300xp. Perception 35+, Quick Draw
system.effect: Once per round as a Half Action or Reaction, Character can have one Drone under their Command immiedately make an Attack Action against any foe within range as a Free Action.

description.value: Once per round as a Half Action or Reaction, Character can have one Drone under their Command immiedately make an Attack Action against any foe within range as a Free Action.
